page.title: 19FUTURE OF MARLEY HILL AREA
page.content: {FARMS}Buildings will be modernised. Crops and animals may change according to eating habits.Computers will become more widely used. {BUILDINGS}More houses may be built. {SCHOOL}With the building of new houses the school population should increase reversing the present day trend. {TANFIELD RAILWAY}Extension of the line and the development of the area for recreation. {TRANSPORT}Busy,narrow country roads need improvements. {DIALECT}Geordie words still used but these and much dialect is dying out. {LAND}Mining for opencast coal is at the planning stage.The National Coal Board must tidy up the wasteland where Marley Hill Pit and old village used to be. {TYNE AND WEAR METROPOLITAN BOROUGH}is to be abolished.
